page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: THE THANET WAY, WHICH IS NEAR HERNE BAY IS 5O YEARS OLD. THIS ROAD IS VERY DANGEROUS BECAUSE IT USED TO HAVE 3 LANES BUT NOW THERE ARE ONLY 2 IN THE SAME SPACE. HOLIDAY MAKERS DO NOT KNOW THIS ROAD AND TRY TO OVERTAKE WHERE IT IS NOT SAFE. THE POLICE GAVE US SOME INFORMATION ABOUT ACCIDENTS. BETWEEN GREENHILL & MILL LANE JUNCTION, FROM MAY 1982 - MAY 1985, 34 CYCLISTS WERE INJURED, A LARGE NUMBER OF THESE WERE FRENCH STUDENTS VISITING THE TOWN. PEDESTRIANS CROSS THIS ROAD TO GET TO HERNE BAY AND 11 OF THEM WERE INJURED. 26 PEOPLE WHO USE MOTOR CYCLES HAD ACCIDENTS, 17 RIDERS AND 9 PILLION PASSENGERS WERE KILLED OR INJURED. THE FINAL GROUP OF PEOPLE TO HAVE HAD ACCIDENTS ARE MOTORISTS. 11 DRIVES AND 14 PASSENGERS BEING KILLED OR INJURED. {BE CAREFUL ON THE THANET WAY!
